rules_text:
Discard a land card, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
Ploy – Put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. [i](When this creature attacks, you may trigger its ploy. If you do, sacrifice it at the next end step.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Chance-in-Hell was not alone in wanting the Tensu elders gone.[/i]
